title: Have 17,000 foreign criminals and 6,000 MS-13 gang members been arrested in 2018?
subtitle: This allegation, which appears on the National Republican Party's "Historical Facts" page, has distorted several figures to put forward a misleading argument.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In 2018, more than 17,000 adults arrested at the border had previous criminal records, including 6,000 gang members (many MS-13).
